Kimi no Kimochi: Music video for the song Kimi no Kimochi sung by Satoshin (Shin Satou), a well know picture book writer, and Rina (Rina Hatakeyama), a famous child actress, that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The song was released as a maxi single that same month. The video was animated by Yoshiko Misumi.
